summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 1 of Ordinance 105676 (as last amended by Ordinance 110200) to establish current titles of certain City supervisory employees and fixing a date certain as the effective date for salary adjustments for such supervisors in the City Light and Engineering Departments; fixing compensation for certain City Light and Engineering positions; revising certain benefits under, and City payments for, benefit plans for certain City Light and Engineering Department employees who are supervisors of City employees represented by the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, Local No. 77; and providing payment therefor.
